Statute.Title: Payment Card Networks Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Réseaux de cartes de paiements, Loi sur les)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2010, c. 12, s. 1, ss. 1 to 5 and 8 as enacted by s. 1834 in force on assent 12.07.2010; ss. 6 and 7 as enacted by s. 1834 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 1850 — Not in force
CIF, 2021, c. 23, s. 184 in force on assent 29.06.2021
